section.p: The following rule array keywords are not supported in releases before Release 4.4:

ul.li: Script selection algorithm and method keyword AES-CBC
MAC length and presentation keyword MACLEN16
PINs contained in encrypted ISO-4 PIN blocks are not supported in releases before Release 5.4.

Support for three-key Triple-DES keys is not available in releases before Release 5.4 and Release 6.2. Beginning with Release 5.4 and Release 6.2, this verb supports triple-length DES keys. For a list of supported three-key Triple-DES key types beginning with Release 5.4 and Release 6.2, see .

The following rule array keywords are not supported in releases before Release 5.6:
Script process keyword SCR2013
Script process keyword SCR2020
